source.title: Salvia
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria Vol. 4 Dicotyledons Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Conn, B.J. (1999). Salvia. In: Walsh, N.G, Entwisle, T.J., Flora of Victoria Vol. 4 Dicotyledons Cornaceae to Asteraceae, pp. 428-430. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves 60–95 mm long, 20–30 mm wide, length-to-width ratio 3.1–4.5, rather thin-textured; usually a small to medium sized tree, sometimes a shrub
Leaves 30–46 mm long, 12–20 mm wide, length-to-width ratio 2.3–2.7, thickish in texture; medium-sized compact shrub
